(50931, 54199).description: The rate at which plants and other organisms produce organic matter, influencing ecosystem functioning and species distribution

(50931, 54199).name: secondary productivity
(50931, 54199).label: variable
(50931, 54199).description: The rate at which consumers, such as animals, produce biomass, influencing ecosystem functioning and species distribution

(50931, 54199).name: community structure
(50931, 54199).label: variable
(50931, 54199).description: The composition and organization of species within an ecosystem, influencing ecosystem functioning and species distribution

(50931, 54199).name: trophic interactions
(50931, 54199).label: variable
(50931, 54199).description: The interactions between species that feed on each other, influencing ecosystem functioning and species distribution

(53704, 56254).label: location
(53704, 56254).description: A region in Northern Europe, including parts of Norway, Sweden, Finland, and Russia, known for its subarctic environment and biodiversity

(53704, 56254).label: species

(53704, 56254).name: circumpolar North
